module.name: DAHDi Config
module.changelog: *2.11.29* Russian language support *2.11.28* Dont depend on modprobe to give accurate information *2.11.27* Fixes: #6963, #6955, #6962, #6961, #6960, #6959, #6351, #6797, #6921, #6742, #6919 *2.11.26* Remove symlinked hook file on uninstall *2.11.25* Allow editing and sorting of DAHDi Modules File Directly *2.11.24.1* #6585, #6461, #6583 *2.11.24* Fixes #6583, Add txgain and rxgain per digital card. *2.11.23* Fixes Lanuage Name #6442 *2.11.22* Fixes #6434, #6438, #6361 Add many more languages (not all are tested). Fixed issue of resetting data on module upgrade. *2.11.21* Fixes #6434,#6436 (only show fwringer of module is wctdm) added italian re #6361 *2.11.20* Fixes #6420 dont allow usage of fwringdetect in 2.6.0 and greater *2.11.19* Add sangoma GSM card control and setup *2.11.18* Fixes #6329 and random Insert fatal *2.11.17* Fixes #6346, dont try to write to sangoma config if we set the option to no (default) *2.11.16* Fixes #6329 and random Insert fatal *2.11.15* Fixes #6289, also allows users to define the location of dahdi and dahdi configuration files *2.11.14* With help from [sr] Fixes #6244 and also fixes #6247 *2.11.11* Fix #6281, #6269. Work on BRI re #6244 *2.11.9* Protect End Users Configuration Files *2.11.8* Sangoma Support *2.11.7* Fixed modprobe overwrite issue and space after equals *2.11.6* Moshe skinin' *2.11.5* Remove mac extra atts...again *2.11.4* Finished modprobe additional custom entries and cleanup *2.11.3* Fix up restarting issues and General Settings additional Settings *2.11.2* Add to extended repo *2.11.1.8* Fixes #4409 *2.11.1.5* Fixes #4558, #4837, #5005, #5256 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.1* #4921 *2.9.0.0* #4914, #4915 *2.8.0.1* dependency set to 2.8 because of dahdi tables *2.8.0.0* adds hooks into extensions and trunks pages and other fixes and tweaks *0.1* initial commit
